pages.text: Diese Rüstungen wurden einst von den $(thing)Kriegern des Lichts$() aus $(lissa)Birth by Sleep$() getragen. The armor once protected its wearer from the darkness surrounding the lanes between, now it protects you in combat.

These armor sets can be crafted in the style of Terra, Ventus, Aqua, Eraqus, Xehanort and Albtraum-Ventus. Get in a Smithing Table and combine them with an orange, blue, lime green, black, white or gray dye.
